'''Brandon "kingbdogz" Pearce''' is a [[Mojang Studios]] employee currently working as a game designer at the headquarters in Stockholm, Sweden.<ref name=":0" />

== Biography ==

Brandon attended {{w|Ballajura Community College}} from 2007 to 2012.<ref name="linkedin">[https://www.linkedin.com/in/brandon-james-pearce/ Brandon Pearce on Linkedin]</ref> In 2010, while he was in community college, Brandon started his game design career by independently creating the popular [[mod]]s ''The Aether'' and ''Aether II'', which were downloaded millions of times worldwide. For a decade, he worked as the team lead for a group of modders around the world to develop mods for ''Minecraft''. Besides his famous work as a modder, Brandon also worked as Software Developer at Nerd Kingdom (2013-2014) and Innovation Engineer at VGW (2018-2019).<ref name="linkedin"/>

In January 2020, Brandon joined Mojang Studios as a Game Designer.<ref name="linkedin"/><ref name=":0">{{tweet|kingbdogz|1202594919098961925|Come January 2020, I'll be moving to Sweden to work at Mojang as a Gameplay Developer for Minecraft.|December 5, 2019}}</ref> Since then, he has contributed to designing and developing new ''Minecraft'' features, such as the [[strider]] and the [[warden]], shaping the development of several updates. He also revisited old features in ''Minecraft'' by modifying them through modern game design principles.

Brandon is capable of coding in both Java and {{w|C++}} engines. Stemming from his experience working with team members around the world, he is also familiar with working remotely with teams across different time zones.

== Trivia ==
* In the April fools snapshot [[23w13a_or_b]], naming a [[wolf]] "kingbdogz" using a [[name tag]] causes the wolf to be given a crown.
